references: L. Comtet, Advanced Combinatorics, Reidel, 1974, p. 122, see #19 (2), I(n).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 100); for (n = 0, 1000, write("b059293.txt", n, " ", round(n*(5*n - 14)/12) + 1); ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 25 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 25 2001
